text:
HJS*
I wrote and ashed about income tax for McLuhan
and this is the reply• It appears we will have to
withhold tax on his salary. And we111 also probably
have to deduct Social Security• The booklet (attached)
also brought up some points for me re the Soc. Sec.
deductions for you and me and has really complicated
matters - of which more later, after I've figured on it,
heh
6/9/59
